name: Yet Another Space Defender Game
description:
Yet Another Space Defender Game

(very creative I know)

Your objective is to prevent the asteroids from crashing towards Earth by joining forces with nearby satellite to create a laser wall to prevent the asteroids hitting Earth (and try not to get hit by one yourself)

Gameplay

You the player is controlled by your mouse position and you will need to connect to another satellite by hovering over it. This will create a laser wall to use to destroy incoming asteroids. You can use yourself to destroy the asteroids however this will break all laser wall and lower your  score. With more asteroids hitting Earth it will slowly turn red which means  g a m e o v e r

Your goal is to survive as long as possible and rack up the most score possible

Powerups

Along the way you may find some powerups floating around

Heart: restore Earth health by just a bit

Clock: slow down time for a few seconds

 Shield: create a wall to prevent all incoming asteroids in one direction 

Wacky Mode

We don't talk about wacky mode
